name: Junior Data Analyst
description:
We are looking for a Data Analyst to join our client's team. Our client is ​​​​​​​a US-based cutting-edge life sciences omnichannel marketing and analytics SaaS platform company that partners with pharmaceutical, biotech and other life sciences companies​​​​​​. It works at the intersection of marketing, data science, data management, and analysis technologies, offering a distinctly unique and innovative solution.​​​​​​​:

Responsibilities & Required Skills:

  • Developing and maintaining reports to support decision making using Power BI and MS Excel.
  • Processing & Interpreting data to get actionable insights.
  • Paying strong attention to detail.
  • Possessing strong analytical skills.
  • Expertise in Startup Experience would be highly valuable.
  • 1-2 years experience, ideally within a Data Analyst role.
  • Good level of spoken English.

What's on Offer:

  • Employment in IT company with accreditation.
  • Work alongside & learn from best in class talent.
  • Excellent career development opportunities.
  • Ambitious startup environmen​​​​​​​t.
